attributes.action: Prevent The Government from calling a second EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: They propose that: "We the undersigned call upon HM Government to implement a rule that if the remain or leave vote is less than 60% based a turnout less than 75% there should be another referendum."
attributes.background:
There is a petition on this website to request we rejoin the EU so lets have a petition to prevent there petition from being acted on. 
Do we need to repeal the EU referendum after all the trouble caused. 
What will the rest of the world think if we cannot make a decisive decision.
